snippet: J.P Macura scored 13 points while Remy Abell and Edmond Sumner had 12 each to lead No. 5 Xavier to a 74-57 rout over Butler on Saturday....
lead_paragraph: J.P Macura scored 13 points while Remy Abell and Edmond Sumner had 12 each to lead No. 5 Xavier to a 74-57 rout over Butler on Saturday.

headline.main: No. 5 Xavier Finds Shooting Touch in 74-57 Blowout at Butler
headline.print_headline: No. 5 Xavier Finds Shooting Touch in 74-57 Blowout at Butler
